body.name: Audio-Technica ATH-M50xBT2 Wireless Over-Ear Headphones, Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: Wireless, on-the-go design delivers the same critically acclaimed sonic performance as the original ATH-M50x professional studio headphones. Compatible Bluetooth Profiles-A2DP, AVRCP, HFP, HSP.Specific uses for product : Studio,Professional,Movies and Gaming
Proprietary 45 mm large-aperture drivers and dedicated amplifier deliver exceptional clarity throughout an extended frequency range, with deep, accurate bass response
Low latency mode improves synchronicity between audio and video for smooth streaming and gaming
Premium audio-grade components, including an AK4331 advanced audio DAC and dedicated internal headphone amp, deliver pure, natural sound
Dual mics and beamforming technology ensure crystal-clear call quality
body.description: When we brought the legendary ATH-M50x studio sound into the world of personal wireless audio, we created what are, simply, the best-sounding wireless headphones on the market. But we weren’t content to stop there. Introducing the ATH-M50xBT2, the second generation of our critically acclaimed M-Series wireless over-ear headphones, featuring a number of enhancements to improve performance and usability. But don’t worry – we’ve changed nothing about the critically acclaimed sonic signature. The M50xBT2 delivers the same exhilarating wireless listening experience as its predecessor, offering exceptional clarity and deep, accurate bass response. There’s even the option to adjust the headphone’s EQ settings, if you so choose – make the changes in the A-T Connect app and save directly to the headphones. In addition, we have greatly improved vocal pickup, incorporating beamforming microphone technology for clearer phone calls and communication with the built-in Amazon Alexa voice assistant. We’ve also added multipoint pairing to let you connect wirelessly to two devices at once. An updated USB-C connection, a low latency mode, and compatibility with high-quality audio codecs round out the enhancements.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 2,138 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bluetooth Technology 50 Hr Battery Life Studio Sound Beam Forming Technology

Overview ATH-M50xBT2 The ATH-M50xBT2 is the second generation of our acclaimed M-Series wireless over-ear headphones. With this update, we’ve introduced several noticeable enhancements, such as improved vocal pickup for better call quality, an updated USB-C connection, and multipoint pairing mode.

Expect More from Your Wireless The ATH-M50xBT2 headphones deliver the legendary M50x studio sound – with exceptional clarity and deep, accurate bass response – for an exhilarating wireless listening experience. Enhanced Call Quality Dual mics and beamforming technology provide exceptional vocal pickup, resulting in crystal-clear phone calls and reliable communication with the built-in Amazon Alexa voice assistant. 50 Hr Battery Life With the ATH-M50xBT2 there’s nothing to hold you back. You get up to 50 hours of continuous use on a full charge. Personalized Listening Experience The A-T Connect app allows greater control of your headphones. Easily activate low latency mode, adjust EQ, change volume balance, select voice assistants, locate headphones, change codecs, and more.
Fast Charge Touch for Voice Assist Multipoint Pairing Optional Wired Connection

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been a fan of the original ATH-MX50's for a long time and the ATH-MX50x BT2, is a great upgrade. I am not sure I really needed to upgrade, my originals still work great after 6 years, but I thought the Bluetooth feature would be nice to have. Right out of the box, this headset is great! Fit feels just like the originals, buttons are responsive and seem durable. Being able to plug in is a great option but with the battery life, I don't think I will ever need to use it. I will appreciate this function when I travel as I will be able to plug into the airplane's entertainment system as well as walk around the airport without the cord catching on all of my travel gear. Even though these are not noise-cancelling headphones they do a great job of blocking out unwanted noise. Just like the originals the construction is sturdy, ear cups fit great, nice, and soft on my head. I have no complaints about this product, it is great. Although I highly doubt, I will ever need to, I would purchase this again in a heartbeat. Great product, highly recommended! I may never need to purchase them again, but I will tell everyone else that they should.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great passive NC headphones
reviews.reviewText: These are great headphones in all respects. The build quality is pretty good, sound quality is excellently flat (though I prefer a more bass-heavy sound signature), and they're quite comfortable (though being a sweaty person, my ears sweat after an hour or two wearing these). They don't have lag either when you're watching programs nor playing games. I just found out you can also plug these in using a 3.5mm jack to an audio source and sound goes through even when the headphones are wirelessly off.My only complaint is when you have the headphones connected to two sources via Bluetooth, you don't hear sounds from the two sources at the same time. When I'm listening to music on my PC and a notification sound plays on my phone, the connection to my PC "pauses" for a second or two to acknowledge the notification on my phone, then the PC output resumes. I have to disconnect it from one device so it can play seamlessly on the other.They're great headphones despite a few minor flaws. Definitely worth a try, esp when they're on sale.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get these if you value sound over noise cancelling
reviews.reviewText: Easily the best sounding pair of wireless headphones I've ever owned. The app is a gamechanger for adjusting balances, and getting a sound mix you really enjoy. These headphones sound great, have a long lasting battery life, charge fast, and most importantly the build quality is really strong. However, there is no noise cancelling, but you really don't need it if you're listening at above half volume. The only true downside to these is the fact that the bluetooth pairing process is one of the most braindead systems of all time. You have to hold down 3 buttons (one of which is power) for an arbitrary 15 seconds and 99% of the time the device thinks you're trying to turn it off again instead of pairing. Otherwise these headphones are a no-brainer. At this price you simply will not get more out of your money, when everyone else is moving towards better noise cancelling, audio technica put all their eggs in the sound quality basket, and its really paid off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Sound. Terribly Uncomfortable.
reviews.reviewText: The sound quality is really good for 200$ Bluetooth over-ears. But for myself, they were horribly uncomfortable. There are A LOT positive reviews from people that really like how these headphones feel, I am not one of them. Which is unfortunate because I really wanted to like these - they're the best over-ears I could find without ANC (which I purposefully didn't want), in this price range.The ear-pads are angled, and oval shaped, and relatively small. Which apparently doesn't work for my head-shape. They are a snug fit over the ears - I highly recommend upgrading the ear-pads if you do buy these. The angle of the ears makes the headband sit weird on my head, they feel like they're falling forward on my head. And if I angle them back, the angled / oval ear-pads sit uncomfortably on my ears.They're also heavier than I was expecting, but that's to be expected with BT headphones like this.4 stars because the sound is really good - worth the price. But the shape really didn't work for me -1.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Honestly I just had to say something..
reviews.reviewText: I got my first pair of wired mx40s back in 2016 and they lasted me until nearly the end of 2023. Never had a reason to switch for something different as a solid go to, since they were perfect for what I wanted. I tried a ton of different things and styles (at very different prices) but they just sounded amazing, were relatively cheep, and were just all around one of best headphones I tried over the years.. Until I sat on them while traveling for the 100th time and finally snapped right where the band connected to the right headphone.. now forsaken to go look for something to fill the void I decided it’s time for a upgrade and OMG the 50s are fantastic. They’re somehow lighter, more comfortable, and the Bluetooth was just another plus. Not to mention finding out about how when you use something like to speech to text it will slightly playback your voice so you can actually hear yourself speaking (idk if I’m alone with that feeling of talking when you can’t really hear yourself just being wrong in some way).Honestly, this is my first time ever reviewing a product, but this was something I actually recommend to everyone I knew and wanted to leave a comment for once. If you are looking for a some great headphones I would definitely suggest getting the 50s (it’s worth it). If you are on a budget the 40s are still a solid pair and (from my perception) had a sound signature pretty similar.

O MX50 é marcante. Se você nunca ouviu ele, compre e se deixe impressionar pelo som limpo, balanceado e presente. Não é um fone com curvas de baixo alteradas. Os graves estão presentes, com força, mas sem extravagância. Os médios são muito presentes, com detalhes e texturas bem bacanas!O mais impressionante fica por conta do balanço entre médios e agudos. Use uma fonte de áudio em alta definição, com um bom DAC, será preciso para ouvir toda a faixa sonora.A construção é simples, todo em plástico, mas com uma impressionante qualidade. Coisa da indústria japonesa: uma construção simples, funcional e duradoura. O arco da cabeça não faz pressão, possui um bom acolchoamento.

I have the wire version M50, perfect for my taste of music, adding this wireless for convenience. The first few minutes sound not that good, can hear some distortion. After a day or two plying, now it sounds perfect. Feel very comfortable with the big and soft ear cup. Connection is easy, long enough range.

Al tacto se siente un buen producto, no como uno de tope de gama pero por el precio es bueno. Ligeramente amontonado en la parte de grabes y medio-grabes, los agudos son muy claros y completos.Para algunos el sonido es diferente ya que el sonido es fiel al original sin alteraciones del mismo audífono.Pros:•Larga batería de 50 horas aprox.•Sonifo espectacular para ser Bluetooth, con cable suena mejor.•Carga de 3horas y media y con 10 minutos da 7 horas de uso.Negativos:•Sin apagado automático o sensor para detener la música si te los quitas.• un solo cable de Jack 3.5 a 3.5• los botones un poco riduosos pero nada inaceptable• la diadema con poco alcochado (para ser de uso prolongado deja que desear)•Pesados para no ser tan grandesUn producto para recomendar si no eres fan de los graves exagerados o los inexistentes agudos en la música. Al principio aprietan un poco las orejas pero con unas horas de uso eso cambia.Además que los detalles en plateado son de aluminio, no son de plástico pintado.Recomendación:Comprar otro cable adicional más largo para uso en escritorio, cuidar el forrado de la diadema porque casi no existen repuestos o son complicados de remplazar.

Très léger. Le Bluetooth permet la connexion sur deux appareils en simultané, ce qui est génial. Deux points négatifs: 1. Le câble est un peu court (1,2m) et ne peu pas être remplacer par un câble dont la base du connecteur est un peu large. 2. Les coussinets ne sont pas assez épais, ce qui fait que les oreilles touchent les haut-parleurs. Mais je recommande clairement le casque, les deux points négatifs sont facilement réparable et le câble ne sert pas à grand chose de toute façon. La durée de vie de la batterie est impressionnante.
Bra kvalitet, ljud, bra pris.Det enda som jag saknar är lite längre sladdar…
